objective: To provide insurance coverage to farmers against crop loss due to natural calamities
benefits: Insurance coverage against crop loss due to natural calamities
Payment to eligible farmers (25% of sum insured)
eligibility: Farmers with notified crops in notified insurance units
how_to_apply: Approach nearest bank branch/PACS/authorized channel partner/CSC/insurance intermediary
Fill-up online application form on National Crop Insurance Portal
important_dates_or_frequency: Prior to the commencement of the Kharif season, preferably in the beginning of November of previous year
